headline: Southern Company Ranked as Top U.S. Energy Company in Newsweek's World's Most Trustworthy Companies 2025 List
summary: Southern Company is the highest-ranked U.S. energy company on Newsweek's World's Most Trustworthy Companies 2025 list. Southern Company is listed alongside a prestigious group of companies recognized for earning and maintaining the trust of customers, investors and employees around the world.

headline: Southern Michigan Bancorp, Inc. Announces Third Quarter 2025 Earnings
summary: COLDWATER, Mich., Oct. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Southern Michigan Bancorp, Inc. (OTC Pink: SOMC) announced third quarter 2025 net income of $3,019,000, or $0.65 per share, an increase of $433,000, or 16.70%, compared to net income of $2,586,000, or $0.57 per share, for the third quarter of 2024. For the first nine months of 2025, Southern earned $9,303,000, or $2.01 per share, an increase of $1,552,000, or 20.0%, compared to net income of $7,751,000, or $1.70 per share, for the same nine-mon
